angles.title: Super Bowl 60 MVP: The Overlooked Running Back Value
angles.description: Dig into historical MVP trends, weather impact on passing vs. rushing EPA, and usage rate anomalies to identify undervalued running back MVP candidates. Explore prop bet opportunities.
stats_to_research: Historical Super Bowl MVP winners (position, stats)
Weather data impact on passing/rushing EPA
Running back usage rates in specific weather conditions
Red zone target share for running backs
Current MVP odds for quarterbacks vs. running backs
angles.betting_insights: Identify discrepancies between implied probability and actual player usage/performance projections. Focus on +EV (expected value) prop bets related to rushing yards, touchdowns, and receptions.

angles.title: The Underdog Advantage: Identifying Historical Betting Patterns
angles.description: Analyze historical Super Bowl betting data to uncover patterns related to underdog performance. Examine point spreads, money lines, and over/under trends to identify potential edges.
stats_to_research: Average point spread differential in Super Bowl games
Over/under performance in Super Bowls with similar weather conditions
Impact of key injuries on betting lines
Public betting percentages vs. final outcomes
angles.betting_insights: Determine if there are statistically significant advantages to betting on underdogs in specific Super Bowl scenarios. Quantify the potential ROI (return on investment) based on historical data.

angles.title: The Coaching Strategy X-Factor: Quantifying Aggressiveness
angles.description: Develop a data-driven approach to quantify coaching aggressiveness (4th down attempts, play-calling tendencies). Correlate coaching style with team performance and betting outcomes.
stats_to_research: 4th down conversion rates for each team
Play-calling tendencies in various game situations (down, distance, score)
Historical data on coaching decisions in Super Bowls
Correlation between coaching aggressiveness and win probability
Impact of coaching changes on team performance
angles.betting_insights: Assess how coaching decisions influence in-game betting opportunities. Identify situations where a team's coaching style creates a predictable betting edge.
